name: ALIANZA FOR PROGRESS ON BEHALF OF POWER4PR (FKA OPEN SOCIETY FOUNDATION)
sampleDescriptions:
Puerto Rico-related appropriation bills
Discussed the use of CDBG-DR funding for Puerto Rico, manufacturing, EITC, and CTC.
Discussed the transformation of the Puerto Rico Energy and Power Authority.
